modName: No Prisoners Outift - No outfit during first character creation
summary:
Temporary removes the prisoners outfit during the first character creation in Helgen. 
A very small edit requested by user \"Shadowplay13\" on Reddit.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#c0504d][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]No Prisoners Outfit [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][FONT=Impact][SIZE=3]v1[/SIZE][/FONT]
[line]
[I]Description[/I]
[line]

This mod temporarily removes the armor at the first character creation screen that pops up in Helgen, making you able to see the body of your character.

You might be wondering why you would want this, well, some mods add certain things to your body which you would be unable to see with your prisoners outfit equipped.

The prisoners outfit gets added to your inventory once you gain control over your character.

[line]
[I]Installation[/I]
[line]

Install using the Nexus Mod Manager to install or
Copy all content to the Skyrim/Data folder.

[i]Since this is a very new mod and will most likely not be popular at all, it is not included in the BOSS master list.[/i]

[line]
[I]Requirements[/I]
[line]

- None

[line]
[I]Bugs[/I]
[line]

- None

[line]
[/CENTER]
author: Oplosthee
